to station (soldiers)/to store up/village
difficult/stingy

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: When I left Tuen Mun, it was already 6ish.
sentences.chinese: 离开屯门的时候，已经是六时多了。

sentences.english: Ambulatory Care Centre of Tuen Mun Hospital was completed.
sentences.chinese: 屯门医院日间医疗中心已经落成。

sentences.english: If there are any argument or change, Tuen Mun Canoe Club will make the final judgment.
sentences.chinese: 改及争议，以屯门独木舟会最终决定为准。

sentences.english: Care Centre of Tuen Mun Hospital was completed.
sentences.chinese: 屯门医院日间医疗中心已经落成。

sentences.english: Chandler Animal Clinic, Shop No. 13, G/F, Rainbow Garden, Tuen Mun, New Territories, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 置乐动物诊所，香港新界屯门彩华花园13号铺地下。

sentences.english: At the end point Sham Tseng, you may take mini bus to Tsuen Wan MTR Station.
sentences.chinese: 终点为深井，可在青龙头青山公路乘车往荃湾或屯门。

sentences.english: It has a total catchment area of 17 square kilometres.
sentences.chinese: 屯门河集水区的总面积为17平方公里。

sentences.english: The Ambulatory Care Centre of Tuen Mun Hospital was completed.
sentences.chinese: 屯门医院日间医疗中心已经落成。

sentences.english: Residential and commercial components are also proposed above the future Tuen Mun Centre Station.
sentences.chinese: 屯门中心车站上盖也建议进行住宅及商业发展。
屯门录得三十毫米雨量纪录。

sentences.english: Next stop is Tuen Mun Hospital, the end of zone 3 for single-ride ticket.
sentences.chinese: 下一站系屯门医院，单程车票第三收费区终止。

sentences.english: A footbridge at 3/F connecting Tuen Mun Trend Plaza.
sentences.chinese: 位于3樓的行人天桥連接屯门时代广场。

sentences.english: This is route 507 to Ferry Pier Terminus .
sentences.chinese: 本班为507线列车前往屯门码头。

sentences.english: Next stop is Tuen Mun Hospital, zone 3 for single-ride ticket.
sentences.chinese: 下一站系屯门医院，属单程车票第三收费区。
